channel.title: Minimax on Tommy Reddad
channel.description: Recent content in Minimax on Tommy Reddad

item.title: Discrete minimax estimation with trees
item.description: This morning, I submitted the final version of my paper Discrete minimax estimation with trees (Devroye and Reddad, 2019), which is to appear in the Electronic Journal of Statistics. I think this paper is conceptually quite interesting, and I’m very happy with the final result, so in this post I’ll describe some of the main ideas present in the work.
